name: The Darkness Within
description:
Yuki is searching a way to save her sister. 

After a long search she discovers that only the power of light can save her.. And the only way to obtain it is to climb to heaven. Now she is in this forest where she might find a way to get there... 

There are two different endings. Can you figure out how to get them both? 

Arrows to move 

Space to jump

Left ctrl to attack

This game was made in 1 week for the weekly game jam 86 and platformer jam 

Leave a comment and let me know what you think! 

A lot of effort was put into player and the first level and there was no time to actually finish the game as completely (or as for original design) 

The themes are platformer, platform to heaven and darkness

Graphics is entirely by Stefyxt. Find her on Deviantart and say hi to her
